dao.db

Class CompanyDaoDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDaoDb
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    there is no business logic in this layer. only CRUD (create,read,update and delete) methods and simple methods that will be in use in the facade layer according to the customer needs.
